entities.description: The number of offenders in a particular case, ranging from unknown (0) to specific values.
The relationship of the victim to the offender, such as 'Victim was Spouse'.
Data that is missing or unrecorded in the dataset.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of offenders involved in a particular case.
Describes the relationship between the victim and the offender in a case.
Represents missing or unrecorded data in the dataset.
